users.username: name as given from form input, fb, or anonymous if they would prefer
users.profilepic: url/to/profile/pic... or use a single pic for default
users.paytype: facebook-> save as 1 for smaller data?maybenot?
users.mystory: textarea for a ~breif description of what has happened to them or where they come from
